Course_Title: Laboratory of General and Applied Microbiology
Program_Policies: A grade of C or better is required for all courses in the minor, as specified by Senate Policy 59-10. In addition, at least six credits of the minor must be unique from the prescribed courses required by a student's major(s).; BMB 442, MICRB 408, MICRB 496 and MICRB 497 may not be used to fulfill the requirements for the minor.
